body_html: I switched my aggregation method in my optimizer from EXPIRMENTAL_TREE to EXPERIMENTAL_ACCUMULATE_N. I have not seen the issue since but I am not sure if I have fixed it since it is intermittent and I have not done much training since making that change.
body_text: I switched my aggregation method in my optimizer from EXPIRMENTAL_TREE to EXPERIMENTAL_ACCUMULATE_N.  I have not seen the issue since but I am not sure if I have fixed it since it is intermittent and I have not done much training since making that change.
body: I switched my aggregation method in my optimizer from EXPIRMENTAL_TREE to EXPERIMENTAL_ACCUMULATE_N.  I have not seen the issue since but I am not sure if I have fixed it since it is intermittent and I have not done much training since making that change.
